import logo from './logo.svg'; import {useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import {BrowserRouter as Router,Routes, Route, NavLink} from 'react-router-dom'; import './App.css'; import Login from './components/Customer/Login' import Homepage from './components/Customer/Homepage' import Profile from './components/Customer/Profile' import Cart from './components/Customer/Cart' import Orders from './components/Customer/Orders' import Checkout from './components/Customer/Checkout' import Home from './components/Retail/Home'; import ManageOrder from './components/Retail/ManageOrder'; import ManageDiscount from './components/Retail/ManageDiscount'; function App() { const [isLogin,setLogin] = useState(true); const [user,setUser] = useState(null); const [LoginType,setLoginType] = useState('') console.log("login ",isLogin) useEffect(() => { setLogin(!isLogin) },[user]) const handleLogin = (event) => { event.preventDefault() let {uid,pass} = document.forms[0] Login({uid: uid.value, pass: pass.value}) setUser(sessionStorage.getItem("user")) if(user!=null){ console.log("yes") } } const handleLogout = (event) => { event.preventDefault() sessionStorage.removeItem("user") setUser(null) } const handleLoginType = (ele) => { setLoginType(ele) } return (
{isLogin ? <> <> Logout Profile Home Cart Orders } /> } /> } /> } /> }/> }/> }/> : <>
